Title: Dreadspears
Legend: Dreadspear shieldwalls form the armoured core of the Darkling Covens’ armies. Fully enthralled to the service of their masters, these cruel warriors fight and slay with unnerving focus.
Intro: Each model in a Dreadspears unit is armed with a Darkling Spear.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Thrall Warhost

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Lordling. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Standard Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Drummer. Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Drummers.

Rules.Name: Coven Guard
Rules.Fluff: These warriors are trained to wait for the perfect moment before thrusting their spears into the hearts of their foes.
Rules.Rule: Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this unit that target an enemy unit that made a charge move in the same turn.
